item.title: Checking Installation
item.description: This post will check the package installation and integration of my site with R and Python. Verification of these steps is necessary to ensure that everything is installed properly. Check the R library installation First, load the library ggplot from the tidyverse. library(ggplot2) Next, plot a sine wave and label the axes. # define the range of the angle to be zero to 2*pi theta <- seq( 0, 2*pi, by = 2*pi/(100 - 1 ) ) # make a data frame that contains both angle and the sine of the angle df <- data.
